story.title: Rugby World Cup at a glance
story.summary: The 2019 Rugby World Cup in Japan at a glance on Wednesday:Pool DAt Kamaishi CityUruguay 30 Fiji 27Standings (played, won, drawn, lost, points scored, points conceded, bonus points, total)Wales 1 1 0 0 43 14 1 5Australia 1 1 0 0 39 21 1 5Uruguay 1 1 0 0 30 27 0 4Fiji 2 0 0 2 48 69 2 2Georgia 1 0 0 1 14 43 0 0Match point allocation: 4 - win, 2 - draw, 1 - losing by fewer than eight points or scoring four triesPlaying ThursdayPool BAt FukuokaCanada v Italy (0745 GMT)Pool CAt...

xmlText.p: The 2019 Rugby World Cup in Japan at a glance on Wednesday:
Standings (played, won, drawn, lost, points scored, points conceded, bonus points, total)
Match point allocation: 4 - win, 2 - draw, 1 - losing by fewer than eight points or scoring four tries
10: Fidow, Leiua (both SAM), Latu (AUS), Matawalu (FIJ), Mo'unga (NZL), Ntamack (FRA), Tuilagi (ENG)
2: Fidow, Leiua (both SAM), Latu (AUS), Matawalu (FIJ), Tuilagi (ENG)
Note: Pool winners and runners-up qualify for quarter-finals
